title: Screen flickering in Cockpit with Firefox
content:
I am using Firefox on Windows 11, in the process of switching from Chrome.

I run Cockpit (https://cockpit-project.org/) on web servers that I manage, and when I log into it on Firefox the screen flickers constantly, making it unusable.

There is no issue with any other web sites I have visited, and I can still use Cockpit when in Chrome. So ay suggestions on how to troubleshoot and resolve the issue with Cockpit and Firefox?

title: Auto word correction ie spell check and change as I type.
content:
Hi,

Sorry to bore you with this seemingly banal question. I have quite bad dislexia, and although I have full type spell check on Safari, default browser, I cannot work out how to get it work on FFox. I include a copy of machine learning -the bit I'm struggling with: "You can check if a dictionary is installed and active in Firefox in two main ways: through a right-click context menu in a text field or in the Add-ons Manager" Or this freaks me out: "To get spell check working in Firefox, enable "Check your spelling as you type" in General Settings, then ensure you have the correct dictionary installed by visiting Firefox Add-ons and adding your desired language dictionary (like English UK/US) for spell-checking to function correctly in text boxes. If it's still not working, right-click a text field to confirm the dictionary is selected"

I have tried to use my spelling abilities, especially in our #ClimateCrisisClub multiple online forums, without any spell check and it's slowing me down on wondering if the spelling is right etc. The letter positioning as words is ok, I can spot andcorrect, but again slows up. It's very frustrating, and not a great look in presentation. I would be forever in your debt if you can help me. Yours Oliver.
creator: olivergill4

title: Los Marcadores e historicos desaparecieron
content: Los marcadores e histórico continuamente desaparecen. Reinicio y restablezco el Firefox. Cada vez que lo hago aparecen los marcadores e histórico. Cuando cierro el Firefox y lo vuelvo a abrir, desaparecen. Estoy usando el mismo perfil de usuario . No he creado uno nuevo .Tengo muchos años usando el Firefox. Le he instalados algunos temas y extensiones desde hace mucho tiempo . Sincronizo con varias computadores (todas con Windows 10 y un iMac SO Ventura. El Firefox es realmente útil para mi. Me puede ayudar a resolver el problema . Incluso cuando inicio el Firefox y desaparecen los marcadores entro en la pestaña de Marcadores luego en Administrar marcadores - importar y respaldar - importar marcadores - NO ME PRESENTA NINGUNA OPCIÓN de marcadores (lo tengo respaldado en la carpeta descarga. Este problema ya tiene algo de tiempo y estoy evaluando, aunque no me gustaría, cambiar de navegador. Nuevamente, el Firefox ha sido mi navegador de muchos años. No puedo estar restableciendo el Firefox cada vez que entro al sistema. En el caso de la iMac SO Ventura, actualicé a la ultima versión y cada vez que arranco el sistema e inicio Firefox, continuamente recibo un mensaje, a pesar que esta en la versión 146 que debo actualizar la ultima versión. Agradezco la ayuda que me puedan brindar. Gracias

title: Girmiş Olduğum Sitede Ekran Kayıyor Sizde de Aynı Durummu Var
content:
Sabah saatlerinden itibaren siteye erişim sağlamaya çalışıyorum ancak ne yazık ki her denemem sonuçsuz kalıyor. Tarayıcıyı açıyorum, adresi yazıyorum, enter’a basıyorum… ve karşıma çıkan şey yine aynı: boş bir ekran, yüklenmeyen bir sayfa ya da anlamsız bir hata mesajı. Dakikalar geçiyor, sayfa dönüyor, dönüyor ama bir türlü açılmıyor.

İnternet bağlantımı kontrol ediyorum, modemi kapatıp açıyorum, bilgisayarı yeniden başlatıyorum. Yetmiyor. Telefona geçiyorum, mobil veriden deniyorum. Oradan da yok. “Acaba bende mi sorun var?” diye düşünüyorum, başka sitelere giriyorum, hepsi açılıyor. Demek ki sorun bende değil, sorun açıkça bu sitede.

Günümüz teknolojisinde, her şeyin saniyeler içinde erişilebilir olması gerekirken, bir siteye girememek insanın sinirlerini ciddi anlamda zorluyor. Özellikle de acil bir işiniz varsa, bir bilgiye hızlıca ulaşmanız gerekiyorsa ya da sadece rutin olarak ziyaret ettiğiniz bir platformdaysanız, bu durum iyice can sıkıcı hale geliyor.

Saatler geçiyor, tekrar tekrar deniyorum. Bazen sayfa yarım yamalak açılıyor, bazen tamamen beyaz kalıyor, bazen de “sunucuya ulaşılamıyor” gibi klasik ama sinir bozucu uyarılar çıkıyor. Ne bir açıklama var, ne bir bilgilendirme, ne de “şu saatten sonra düzelecek” gibi bir not.

İnsan ister istemez soruyor: Bu site neden çalışmıyor? Bakım mı var, teknik bir arıza mı yaşanıyor, yoksa tamamen mi çöktü? Kullanıcıyı bilgilendirmek bu kadar mı zor? Küçük bir duyuru bile birçok soru işaretini ortadan kaldırmaya yeterdi.

Sonuç olarak, siteye girememe durumu sadece teknik bir problem değil; aynı zamanda kullanıcı deneyimini doğrudan etkileyen ciddi bir sorun. Umarım en kısa sürede bu erişim problemi giderilir, çünkü bu şekilde devam etmesi hem zaman kaybına hem de gereksiz bir sinir harbine dönüşüyor.
creator: Bardorova

title: Picture-in-Picture Problems when in a Different Window
content: Recently, I've been noticing an issue with Firefox's built in Picture-in-Picture (PiP) feature. When watching media, such as a YouTube video, using PiP, the video runs as normal, but recently, the PiP completely breaks when I tab away from my Firefox window to do something in a different app. This wasn't the case a few months ago, so I'm not sure what changed to make this error happen. I had attempted to disable hardware acceleration to see if that was the issue, and nothing changes when it's enabled versus when it's disabled.

title: Firefox repeatedly signs out of mozilla account
content:
I have Firefox 146.01 on 2 windows computers (windows 10 and 11), and on a samsung android phone. I have several extensions (eg uBlock) and I use ExpressVPN.

My mozilla account has a display name and primary email which I verified, and account recovery key enabled. There's no secondary email, no two-step authentication using a third party app. I can readily log the browser back into my mozilla account by entering the password and emailed 6-digit confirmation code, but then it logs me back out within an hour. Each of my 3 devices logs me out repeatedly.

In the address bar I type about:sync-log, and I was able to find the below lines in separate areas of several logs: DEBUG Status.login: success.login => error.login.reason.no_username DEBUG Status.login: error.login.reason.no_username => error.login.reason.no_username ERROR FxA rejecting with error UNVERIFIED_ACCOUNT, details: undefined ERROR Background refresh of initial profile failed: Error: UNVERIFIED_ACCOUNT(resource://gre/modules/FxAccounts.sys.mjs:1669:18) JS Stack trace: _error@FxAccounts.sys.mjs:1669:18 withSessionToken@FxAccounts.sys.mjs:876:18 ERROR Sync encountered a login error DEBUG Exception calling WrappedLock: Error: Login failed: error.login.reason.account(resource://services-sync/service.sys.mjs:1053:15) JS Stack trace: onNotify@service.sys.mjs:1053:15

Based on the above lines, can someone help me figure out why firefox/mozilla keeps signing me out?

Thanks so much

title: Site has seizure, screen stutters w/multiple screens' tabs appearring as scrolling to videos?
content: Hi. I have had an ongoing random problem on videos sites where while scrolling, about half way down page it will suddenly have a seizure, stutter, causing multiple copies of the window to jump up and down. If I "slowly" scroll back up to the "quiet" area (midway to top of screen) it will behave normally. I try and watch the video I had been watching when it went nuts, happens again. I 'think' I got by it the other night...somehow I don't think it was me, rather it just happened to snap back into place. It had been happening more frequently several months ago where it was a real problem, went through all the normally accepted ways of cleaning, checking and hunting for others having a similar problem. The latter is where I have normally found the best and most recent inquiry similar to mine. Good part is it's fast and I know it's not just me. Bad part is it's fast and nobody has had time to answer it. Then it suddenly just stopped. In fact, I had forgotten about it! The bane of my daily computer life for weeks was suddenly gone and I forgot about it???? Well, it reminded me today, it's back. Any suggestions? I had thought it was with some Microsoft changes that had been going on and that had seemed to be the consensus but? Thanks in advance.
